page.title: 17Petworth:Local News
page.content: Petworth: Local News During the past 2 years The Petworth and Midhurst Observer has featured the following issues: The By_Pass - the 50 year battle to ban heavy traffic from the town.The National Trust oppose routes through the park and other groups want to protect their own locality Other Problems_ Leconfield Hall deterioration,litter,Petworth/Ethiopia appeal.Development _self_build housing group,tree_ planting schemes,farming techniques. Organisations featured _ Schools,TownBand,Churches,Players,Fest ival,Twinning Committee (with San Quiroco,Italy),Panthers Soccer Club visit USA,Boys Brigade closes and squash courts open.
